attributes.action: Stop SE Rail from cancelling trains direct to Charing Cross
attributes.additional_details: This decision has been made without consulting the public who pay for these services. It’s an essential service for a lot of people. We want the government to step in and restore this essential service!
attributes.background: SE Rail are planning to cancel all direct services from Abbey Wood / Bexleyheath into Charing Cross. This decision has been made without consultation. Which means anyone traveling on these lines will have to travel to Cannon Street and change! Impact on those will mean time more money spent

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about cancelling rail services are an operational matter for individual train operators, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to fund specific services that have been cut, if that's something you want to happen.
